shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the state of the RTMP or RTMPS streaming changes.

p.codeblock: public void onRtmpStreamingStateChanged( String url, RTMP_STREAM_PUBLISH_STATE state, RTMP_STREAM_PUBLISH_ERROR errCode) {}
public virtual void OnRtmpStreamingStateChanged(string url, RTMP_STREAM_PUBLISH_STATE state, RTMP_STREAM_PUBLISH_ERROR errCode)

section.p: When the CDN live streaming state changes, the SDK triggers this callback to report the current state and the reason why the state has changed. When exceptions occur, you can troubleshoot issues by referring to the detailed error descriptions in the error code parameter.

plentry.pd: The RTMP or RTMPS streaming state, see . When the streaming status is (4), you can view the error information in the errorCode parameter.
The detailed error information for streaming, see .
